altername_name: NCAA College Football 2K2 - Road to the Rose Bowl
name: NCAA College Football 2K2
overview: NCAA College Football 2K2: Road to the Rose Bowl is an American football video game developed by Visual Concepts in association with 2K Sports. It was released in 2001 for only the Sega Dreamcast. The cover athlete is former Purdue standout quarterback Drew Brees.
